WorkPlace.Name: Firmavikar ApS
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription: Som vikar er noget af det vigtigste, at man ikke er bange for at kaste sig ud i nye opgaver, at man har et åbent sind og er glad og udadvendt, at man er fleksibel og klar til at arbejde.Til gengæld kan vi åbne døren for mulige fastansættelser, give dig muligheden for at prøve nye jobs, og give dig en stor adspredelse i hverdagen med mange nye udfordringer.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Are you a carpenter looking for new challenges
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you a skilled carpenter looking for new challenges, then we might need you.
We are currently looking for a team of 2 independent and skilled carpenters with great experience. You will be a part of a very professional and well-established company with great colleagues and good opportunities.  Start date: ASAP.

We offer:

  • Payment according to qualifications
  • Pension, holiday-money and SH
  • 40 working hours per week
  • We provide working clothes and tools
  • Long-term employment

We expect that you are skilled carpenter with good experience. Furthermore, we expect:

  • That you are committed and quality-oriented
  • That you are a team player, but also independent
  • That you are fluent in English

Are you interested in this kind of project, please don’t hesitate to contact us!

Vi ser frem til at høre fra dig

FirmaVikar varetager rekrutteringsprocessen, og er du interesseret i at søge stillingen, bedes du sende en ansøgning via vores hjemmeside. 

LÆS MERE OM JOBBET PÅ VORES HJEMMESIDE - KLIK HER
